channel.title: New tokens and where to get?
channel.description:
I recently created a new shop on my server with tokens as a currency (because people were saying money is hard to make), but I'm not sure how I should make them obtainable. I'm going to make some NPCs drop them, but i figured it would be boring to just do that. I thought maybe a mini-game. Any ideas?
Thankyou in advance.

item.title: New tokens and where to get?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Gain them through pking/skilling; randomly when fletching/from drops ect.

Read full topic
item.source: New tokens and where to get?
